name: Emery Go-Round
fullDescription: Emery Go-Round is a free shuttle bus service operated by the Emeryville Transportation Management Association, connecting Emeryville destinations with the MacArthur BART station.
whatTheyOffer:
- Completely free shuttle service
- Multiple routes throughout Emeryville
- Connection to MacArthur BART station
- Frequent service during business hours
- No pass or registration required
howToGetIt:
1. No registration or pass needed
2. Check the route map and schedule online
3. Go to any Emery Go-Round stop
4. Board when shuttle arrivesâ€”no fare required
keywords: Emery Go-Round, Emeryville, free shuttle, MacArthur BART, free bus, transit, shuttle service
